sentence.Network_en: We should distinguish it into macroscopical and microcosmic labor axiology.

sentence.Network_en: Such arrangement, have strategic height already, also have microcosmic depth.

sentence.Network_en: It is instead of by mathematics from vast universe space to microcosmic.
